definition: rich/abundant/exuberant/to add for free/to throw in as bonus/to spare/to forgive/despite/although

sentences.english: Initial tension melted into transparency and forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 最初的紧张融化为透明和饶恕。

sentences.english: Thou to whom I dare not lift mine eyes, wilt Thou yet pardon me?
sentences.chinese: 啊，我不敢抬眼仰望的天神啊，你还肯再饶恕我吧。

sentences.english: I will pardon you, who are honest.
sentences.chinese: 我愿意饶恕你，你是诚笃的。

sentences.english: I throw myself at your mercy.
B woman who can't forgive should never have more than a nodding acquaintance with a man.
sentences.chinese: 不懂饶恕的孺人永恒只能是汉子的颔首的交情。

sentences.english: The one unpardonable sin of nature is to stand still, to stagnate.
sentences.chinese: 自然界最不可饶恕的罪行就是驻足不前，淤滞停止。

sentences.english: Because in your eyes, your past was too unforgivable.
sentences.chinese: 因为在你眼里，过去难以饶恕。

sentences.english: Forgive them and let it go.
Description: One of the Unforgivable Curses. The imperius curse gives the spell-caster complete control over their victim.
sentences.chinese: 不可饶恕咒之一，这个咒语能完全控制受害者。

sentences.english: Experience His love and receive His forgiveness for your sins.
sentences.chinese: 感受到他的爱和对你罪恶的饶恕。

sentences.english: Confess your sins and ask for forgiveness when necessary.
sentences.chinese: 承认你的过犯，必要的时候请求饶恕。

sentences.english: Evil meant to do good is still evil and evil in a cloak of goodness is unpardonable.
sentences.chinese: 为善而恶还是恶，以善包装的恶则更无可饶恕。

sentences.english: On only one condition can I hope to forgive him.
sentences.chinese: 只有一个情况，可以使我有希望饶恕他。

sentences.english: Hate stirs up trouble, but love forgives all offenses .
sentences.chinese: 怨恨只能徒增烦恼，而爱能饶恕所有的罪过。

sentences.english: How can bear to see love is difficult and emotional unforgivable love to mess things up.
sentences.chinese: 可怎么忍心看爱有为难，情感也不能饶恕爱胡来。

definition: to pardon/to absolve/to exempt from punishment
to atone for one's crime/to buy freedom from punishment/redemption/atonement
